title: Welcome to My Portfolio
text:
About Me
Hello! I’m Laura Jochim, currently pursuing my Master’s in Methodology and Statistics for Behavioral, Biomedical, and Social Sciences at Utrecht University. At the moment I specialize in Artificial Intelligence in the field of biomedicine and my interests extent to Bayesian inference, Deep learning, Causal Inference, and psychological Diagnostics.

Current tasks

Medical Imaging: Creating synthetic CT scans based on MRI scans and evaluating the performance and uncertainty of the model.
Synthetic Data: Creating synthetic tabular healthcare data using the neural network architecture GAN.

title: About Me
text:
About Me
I’m a passionate researcher and developer, specializing in: - Predictive analytics and machine learning - Spatial data analysis (ArcGIS, QGIS) - Statistical modeling (R, Python)
